languages.text: [draft]The Psyker pulls closer the enemies in a semi-circle with a 3-cell radius. The targets are moved by {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}<u>psy rating</u>{/g} directly toward the Psyker, and must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −<u>2×(Psyker's WP {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> penalty or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: [draft]The Psyker pulls closer the enemies in a semi-circle with a 3-cell radius. The targets are moved by <u>psy rating</u> directly toward the Psyker, and must pass a Toughness test with a −<u>2×(Psyker's WP bonus)</u> penalty or become prone for 1 round.
